content: degree in Communications with an emphasis on Public Relations. As an SHRM member, she remains current with employment law and H.R. updates. Linkedin Paul Jackson Director of Business Development Paul Jackson has successfully built a 30-year career and spent years developing Elmhurst Hospitalâ€™s occupational health network. During this time, he received a nomination from President George Bush for innovative solutions in establishing a first responder Hepatitis B vaccination program. Paul parlayed his marketing expertise into the dialysis world in 2012 and since then has championed DCC partnerships across the country. Linkedin Lori Morrell Director of Revenue Cycle Management & Contracting Lori Morrell has over 25 years of administrative experience in the healthcare industry. She manages the ever-growing revenue cycle team of admissions, billing, accounts receivable, revenue cycle, and insurance specialists. She utilizes her passion in this role to create exceptional supervisors and managers within her revenue cycle team, who help contribute to the continued success of the revenue cycle management department. The most rewarding thing for Lori has been assisting patients in resolving complex issues and ensuring they get the best quality care in DCC.
title: Leadership - Dialysis Care Center
